title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series - 1v1 - Starting in 3 Days.

embed.description: This organization will run tournaments for teams of all ranks and skill level.

body:
A few more details.

This tournament is an online event. You will be given a tournament code to enter each match. 

Tournament codes will only be valid on the Oceanic Server.
You will need a valid League Of Legends account on the Oceanic Server in order to compete.

This tournament is open to players of any rank, or even unranked players.

Howling Abyss is the Map.

Note: this is a first to take the Nexus in a 1v1 (and ~~not~~ a first blood/1st to 100cs) match format. 
After testing, game duration was found to be between 10-20 minutes per match approximately.

The tournament starts at 9am Saturday morning on the 18th March 2017, and will run until a final winner is decided on the same day.

regards 
Digital Puppet Masters Team.
